item.title: Hello Blog!
item.description: Hi there 👋 I never really thought I'd be one to write and talk about myself. I've always had a habit of locking away my thoughts and processing them over and over until I get distracted by something else to think about. So, this blog is really another form of expression about the topics I often analyse (or over-analyse) in my day-to-day work and personal life. As you probably know, after I left University all those years ago, I began a career in Software Engineering.
